front.title: Quantum Safe Cryptography Key Information for FALCON

abstract.t: This proposal defines key management approaches for the Quantum Safe Cryptographic (QSC) algorithm FALCON which has been selected for standardization by the NIST Post Quantum Cryptography (PQC) process. This includes key identification and key serialization. The purpose is to provide guidance such that the adoption of quantum safe algorithms is not hampered with the fragmented evolution of necessary key management standards. Early definition of key material standards will help expedite the adoption of new quantum safe algorithms and at the same time as improving interoperability between implementations and minimizing divergence across standards.
